column5: Large BR with Queen Bed & Shared bath, in a well Decorated & Super Clean House, convenient to all amenities. I will be always available to make sure every guest is comfortable & well cared for. House is in a new & quiet subdivision. It's is 5min to Lackland AFB & major shops, 15-20 min to downtown, Toyota Plant, Medical area, Sea World, Six Flags, Fort, ... Please Call at least 2 hours prior to arriving.
